original_text: And when the demon had been cast out, the mute man spoke. And the crowds marveled, saying, “Never was anything like this seen in Israel.”
korean_text: 귀신이 쫓겨나고 말 못하는 사람이 말하거늘 무리가 놀랍게 여겨 이르되 이스라엘 가운데서 이런 일을 본 적이 없다 하되

sentences.original_text: And when the demon had been cast out
saying, “Never was anything like this seen in Israel.”
sentences.korean_translation: 말하되, “이스라엘에서 이런 일을 본 적이 결코 없었다.”
